item.title: Ukulele Time: Sunny - Bobby Hebb & Boney M. & Marvin Gaye
item.description: Play along video for the song Sunny from the channel Ukulele Time. Artists: Bobby Hebb & Boney M. & Marvin Gaye. Chords: A7, C♯7, Dmaj7, F♯m, G7, G♯m7.
